Holy heck! This shirt is more than expected! For 30 years I’ve bought traditional fabric dress shirts. I took a gamble because I wanted to try something new. I figure, “hey, it’s 15 bucks…” when I got it, it was stretchy and just weird to me(because I’m use to Oxford materials). After washing, the wrinkles from packaging were still there and I assumed I would have to spend money at the dry cleaners to get those manufacture wrinkles out. I was so wrong! They came out after one pass!!! I’m truly impressed and sold on it. Super lightweight and flexible! I will definitely buy more. To the makers of this shirt: Go home tonight with your head high. Be proud of your work, it’s amazing!

Estas camisas me gustan mucho, se ajustan al tamaño del cuento con un tamaño excelente para el cuello, así puede abotonar para corbatas. Uso 42.5 de pecho y generalmente las camisas vienen 14.5 de cuello y no me cierra, pero estas vienen 42.5 de pecho y 16.9 de cuello, excelente. ahora mis trajes se ven mas elegantes con estas camisas que puedo cerrar el cuello con el botón, las corbatas caen perfecto. La recomiendo para el que tenga mi problema de pecho y cuello en relacion al tamaño de la camisas. En sentido general, la camisa es suave, un poco delgada en la tela, pero su calidad sorprende por su precio. además es comprado camisas mas caras que no tienen esta ventaja en el pecho 42.5 con cuello 16.9. La volvere  comprar en muchos colores y el blanco.

offers a mixed bag of qualities. While it boasts a flattering fit and impressive wrinkle resistance, the material quality leaves much to be desired.  Pros:  Fit: The shirt fits true to size and drapes well on the body. Wrinkle Resistance: It retains its shape remarkably well, even after a long day of wear. Cons:  Material Comfort: The fabric feels uncomfortable against the skin, causing itchiness. Material Quality: The material quality seems subpar for a dress shirt, lacking the expected softness and breathability. Overall:  While the Alimens & Gentle Men’s Dress Shirt excels in fit and wrinkle resistance, the discomfort caused by the material significantly detracts from its overall appeal. If you’re looking for a shirt that can withstand the rigors of a busy day without wrinkling, but prioritize comfort, you may want to consider other options
